short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Solve for the volume of cones, spheres, and cylinders.  Do NOT use to cheat on tests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can be used to solve for the volume of:
• Cones
• Spheres
• Cylinders
• Rectangular prisms
• Triangular prisms
• Pyramids
This extension was made for helping when stuck, not for cheating on tests.
Do NOT use to cheat on tests!
If you have any issues, please contact me.
